animals.name: Antilocapra americana
animals.habitat: Grasses and shrubs of the Great Plains, western United States, and southern Canada
animals.diet: Herbivorous, feeding on grasses, forbs, and browse
animals.physical_characteristics: Large eyes, long eyelashes, stocky body, short tail, white rump patch, brownish-red coat with white markings

animals.name: Saiga Antelope
animals.habitat: The Saiga Antelope inhabits the steppes and grasslands of Central Asia, particularly in Russia, Kazakhstan, Mongolia, and China.
animals.diet: The Saiga Antelope is a herbivore, feeding on grasses, leaves, and other vegetation.
animals.physical_characteristics: The Saiga Antelope has a distinctive set of horns, a long snout, and a white coat with black markings. It can grow up to 1 meter in length and weigh between 20-40 kilograms.

animals.name: Badger
animals.habitat: Forests, grasslands and wetlands in Europe and Western Asia.
animals.diet: Insectivorous, feeding on insects, worms, fruits, roots and small mammals.
animals.physical_characteristics: Short, stocky body with a distinctive white stripe running along its back. Short legs and powerful claws.

animals.name: Badger
animals.habitat: Forests, grasslands and wetlands in Europe, Asia and North Africa.
animals.diet: Insects, small mammals, fruits, roots and carrion.
animals.physical_characteristics: Short, stout body; distinctive white stripes on the face; short legs and a long, pointed snout.

animals.name: Ratpenat
animals.habitat: Serpentins i arbres de la selva tropical
animals.physical_characteristics: Crida el nom de Ratpenat a causa dels seus petits peus i les seves ales membranoses
